description:
On May 26th, Mindera will open its doors and welcome everyone who wants to hear and learn about Frontend.
Get to know us a little bit better - the technologies that passionate us and how we work. 
This time, we also have a surprise: invited speakers who will come and share their knowledge too!
We dare you to spend your saturday with us, participate in our talks and workshop ;)

Check the agenda bellow:
11:00 - 11:30 - Welcome to Mindera (check-in)
11:30 - "I GraphQL, You GraphQL, Everyone GraphQL!" - Fernando Ferreira (Mindera)
12:00 - Talk (to be announced)
12:30 - "Props Per Minute” - António Capelo (Moxy)
13:00 - Lunch
14:30 - "Electronic Javascript Music" - Manuel Madeira (Mindera)
14:30 - Workshop: “Up and running with react and graphql” - Gil Millasseau e Luís Almeida (Mindera)
15:00 - “Smooth CSS animations: aiming for 60fps” - Nelson Leite (Farfetch)
15:30 - "Deliver big, develop better, build small" - Pedro Morgado (Mindera)
16:00 - Closing

Meet you there?
PS. If you want to join the workshop, chose "Mindera | Frontend Tech Day + Workshop" ticket and don't forget to bring you computer! Install Node.JS and if you are a Window's friend, make sure you have git bash terminal!
name: Mindera | Frontend Tech Day
